## Software & Tools

### R Packages

#### boilerplate
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/boilerplate)](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/boilerplate)
The `boilerplate` package provides tools for generating standardised boilerplate text and documentation for research projects. Available on CRAN.

- [Documentation](https://go-bayes.github.io/boilerplate/)
- [Source Code](https://github.com/go-bayes/boilerplate/)

#### margot (migrating to margotverse)

- [Documentation](https://go-bayes.github.io/margot/)

## Package Migration Notice
The `margot` package is currently being restructured into the `margotverse` ecosystem. This migration will provide a more modular and maintainable framework for causal inference. Please check our GitHub for the latest updates.
:::

A comprehensive framework for causal inference with panel data, supporting doubly robust estimation and sensitivity analyses.
